scripts.start: sls offline & (cd frontend && npm run serve)
scripts.build: npm install && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy: NODE_ENV=development (npm run build:frontend && npm run deploy:development)
scripts.deploy:development: NODE_ENV=development (npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend)
scripts.deploy:production: NODE_ENV=production (npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend)
scripts.clear-frontend-cache: npx cloudfront-invalidate-cache --cname www.barracaodigital.com && npx cloudfront-invalidate-cache --cname dev.barracaodigital.com
